website_summaries.verdict: An easy to apply, fast-acting nail formula.
pros: Much to our surprise, this formula did not smell like garlic at all
We noticed that within a week, thin and peeling nails felt stronger
The formula itself is quite thin, making it easy to apply
We recommend using this formula as a base coat under your normal nail polish
It keeps your nails healthy while keeping your polish on for longer
cons: There is a slight green tint to the formula, but it's almost unnoticeable

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Can't see any difference using this. Save your money not worth $14.00.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra L.

customer_reviews.title: I am very happy with Probelle Nail maintenance with Garlic & Lime
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with Probelle Nail maintenance with Garlic & Lime. My hand and foot nails look so much healthier. Will stick to this product. Highly recommend purchasing it .
customer_reviews.author: Nana C

customer_reviews.title: Yellow/green nails after use!
customer_reviews.text: This product is green - not clear. Leaves your nails looking yellow (light green) after two uses. Looks like the hands of a smoker. Will not use this product again.
customer_reviews.author: AMS

customer_reviews.title: Not nearly as effective as stage 1 Touch n Grow
customer_reviews.text: I used stage 1 Probelle Touch n Grow according to directions and watched my nails grow strong very quickly. I moved on to this product (stage 2) expecting continued results and my nails began to break again. I prefer to use stage one as a base coat.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany

customer_reviews.title: Green nails for a stronger nail
customer_reviews.text: This stuff really works, but prepare to have green nails when wearing it. Once you remove it your nails will be in good condition.
customer_reviews.author: CeeCee

customer_reviews.title: My nails are hard to grow... Didn't work for me
customer_reviews.text: My nails are super hard to grow and are frail and fragile. Therefore, did not work for me.
customer_reviews.author: Marian L. Brown

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this products based on the reviews I have read. I was not impressed.
customer_reviews.author: frances n

customer_reviews.title: Ick
customer_reviews.text: this product has formaldehyde. What?! That definitely was not made clear in the description.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Quarles

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It works. Was surprised to see this product work. My nails have grown, they're no longer brittle.
customer_reviews.author: mar62

customer_reviews.title: great product , really does work !
customer_reviews.text: this really does help , it got my natural nails ready for me to start using my Gel Polish !
customer_reviews.author: nikki

customer_reviews.title: Yes Yes Yes
customer_reviews.text: Very happy to see it does not smell like garlic, will continue usage when done with the fungal nail treatment
customer_reviews.author: Rita

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't smell like garlic though and I like that
customer_reviews.text: I've only used this once so can't say if it is really doing anything. Doesn't smell like garlic though and I like that.
customer_reviews.author: darlene goddard

customer_reviews.title: It's really amazing
customer_reviews.text: I have never had great nails but thanks to Probell I do now - I never review products but this one is exceptional! My sister always comments on them since she knows I've never had great nails.
customer_reviews.author: Carolynnkaye

customer_reviews.title: Preserved nail strength
customer_reviews.text: Love this product! Used it as a base and top coat over 2 coats of color and the polish looked perfect for over a week. My nails felt stronger and I had no new splits or chips. I definitely recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Debby Thompson

customer_reviews.title: My nails were just in bad shape from having shellac for many years
customer_reviews.text: It's just ok. My nails were just in bad shape from having shellac for many years. This helped enough for them to grow out a bit.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. V

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Didn't work for my daughter who bites her nails. It also came off very quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Jaclyn

customer_reviews.title: Makes your nails look greenish
customer_reviews.text: I love the #1 formula in this, but didn't continue to use this one because it leaves your nails looking greenish.
customer_reviews.author: Nikilet

customer_reviews.title: I can tell a huge difference in my nails. ...
customer_reviews.text: I can tell a huge difference in my nails. After about two weeks my nails are no long soft and brittle.
customer_reviews.author: Carlene

customer_reviews.title: amazing for my soft nails
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is amazing! Ive had it on for 4 days now and no breakage or peeling! My nails feel stronger with it on too!
customer_reviews.author: LAV

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING PRODUCT!
customer_reviews.text: The Touch N' Grow Plus Nail hardener is simply amazing!! Been using it for about 2 weeks and I saw results from the first days!! My nails had cracks and were a little yellowish... now they are perfectly strong, beautiful color, no cracks and grow so fast!!! Thank you PROBELLE
customer_reviews.author: Shusti

customer_reviews.title: Hmmm...
customer_reviews.text: I can not accurately review this product because it turned out that I'm allergic to the formaldehyde that's in it. Wish that was listed in the description, I wouldn't have bought it.
customer_reviews.author: Jewelry Junky

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: I was asked to review this product for free or at a discounted price in exchange for my honest opinion and I have to say I am beyond in love with this product because it helps your nails grow and gives it a natural looking shine I definitely recommend buying if your trying to get your nails to grow and look healthy you would think it would have a foul smell because of the garlic in it but you can't even smell anything other than nail polish I love it
customer_reviews.author: asha

customer_reviews.title: makes your nails like they are full of fungus
customer_reviews.text: ok, so this made my nails look like they have fungus, super gross, guess I should have figured since its green but, really thought it wouldn't.
customer_reviews.author: Glamgardner

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't Work for Me
customer_reviews.text: I was hopeful this product would strengthen my nails and help them grow. Typically, I put on a new coat every day. After using the product for over a month, my nails are still breaking, splitting and peeling. I don't plan on buying this product again.
customer_reviews.author: 247Mom2Boys

customer_reviews.title: Miracle
customer_reviews.text: This product is amazing!!!! I have always had a hard time growing my nails they would be always breaking specially chipping but now they are growing beautiful and strong!!!! This also gives a nice smooth shiny finish so I used it like a top coat with or without color! U would think cause it has garlic it would smell bad but no not bad at all!! Great formula! I received this item for free in exchange of my honest opinion
customer_reviews.author: carmen auwera

customer_reviews.title: but in all honesty it smells just like regular fingernail polish
customer_reviews.text: Probelle Nail Maintenance with Garlic and Lime, Formula 2, is helping my nails grow. I have always had fairly short nails. no matter what I did. However, since I received this, I have been putting a thin layer of the clear liquid on my nails and they really do feel harder and are growing longer. I was expecting a strong garlic and lime smell, but in all honesty it smells just like regular fingernail polish. ***i RECEIVED THIS PRODUCT FREE IN Exchange FOR MY HONEST AND UNBIASED REVIEW ****
customer_reviews.author: Rhett Authement

customer_reviews.title: Finally something that works!
customer_reviews.text: I started using Probelle’s Touch n’ Grow and within 2 or 3 weeks, my nails started to grow in Naturally! As a way to maintain the healthiness of my new beautiful natural nails, I now use Probelle’s Touch n’ Grow Plus with Garlic and Lime. The great thing about this product is the lack of garlic smell that is normally associated with other similar products. I have used Touch n’ Grow Plus with my weekly manicures for a few months now and have fallen in love completely with how beautiful my nails look and feel!!
customer_reviews.author: Nicole K. Vasco

customer_reviews.title: I am a guy so i don't like my nails to look as if they have any ...
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this product for a few months now, i used to bite my nails at night and since I started applying this Nail hardener it has not only help me to stop bitting my nails but also they are strong. I am a guy so i don't like my nails to look as if they have any product on top and this product does a well job with that too. I will highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Danny Adatto

product_meta.title: Probelle Nail Maintenance with Garlic and Lime, Formula 2, Clear, Nail Strengthening and Nail Protein Treatment .5 Fluid Ounce
product_meta.description: Formulated with Garlic and Lime, Touch N' Grow Plus is the perfect formula to maintain healthy nails. With special elements extracted from garlic, not only does this amazing formula harden and grows the nail, it also protects against fungus. Along with Garlic, Lime is a key additive to maintain hardness and growth while restoring the whiteness of the nail. Apply a thin coat daily for several days to stop peeling, cracked, and split nails. Once the nail becomes healthier and stronger use with regular manicure as a base coat. We recommend using Touch N' Grow (Formula 1) for 2-4 weeks prior to Touch N' Grow Plus.
feature_bullets: Maintains Whiteness and protects against fungus
Hardens the nails and stops chipping
Cure, Repair, and Restore Damaged Nails
Use with normal manicure to maintain healthy nails
